text: Nɨbi yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgebɨm ak, gos awl ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨgɨm. Wulep mɨdeb, Satan ne kɨli God nop chɨg tep gɨnɨgabal akaŋ apyap pakɨnɨgabal agɨl, ne gek, nɨbop ogɨnap dɨ nag lɨnɨgabal agak. Pen yɨp yɨl mɨdebɨm ak nɨŋɨd, nɨbop ñɨn anep wajɨlem ak tek, gɨ tɨmel gɨlɨg yenɨgabal agak. Pen nɨbop tɨtay dɨnɨgel akaŋ, pɨsnep paklɨnɨg gel, gos awl anɨb ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Yɨp chɨgɨl nep mɨdem nɨbop paklenɨgabal, tap teplep yɨbɨl nɨbop ñɨnɨgayn agak. Tap teplep anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, nɨbi pel pelnep yenɨgabɨm agak.
